.. _index:

=============================
BCM - Beamline Control Module
=============================

This document describes function and application programming interfaces for the CMCF Beamline 
control module and MXDC interactive data acquisition system.

========

    :maxdepth: 3
    :numbered:

    installation
    api/index
    mxdc/index
